title: ENABLE TWISTED TREELINE EVERYDAY
body: I see no reason anymore why it is only enabled for three days a week (Thursday, Friday, Saturday) and from 3pm-1am the next day. It was accidentally enabled on the Sunday this past week and I actually waited less time waiting for a match than on the regular days it is enabled. PLEASE ENABLE TWISTED TREELINE 7 DAYS A WEEK. I can't be the only one

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=iFdEkXnp,comment-id=00250000,timestamp=2015-07-28T11:03:48.852+0000)
> 
> It's in a good place right now, but we don't have plans to expand the available hours no. If it does grow to the point of being able to do that we will post it on boards.
That's almost a month ago. My TT queue's are almost the same as my normal match queue's they should trial it for a week. Frustrating when it's all I play :/
